website_summaries.verdict: A good option for anyone wanting to build a simple ship in a bottle model kit.
pros: Kit comes with everything needed to assemble a fully detailed and intricate ship inside a protective bottle display case
The required work and skill is less than making a ship in a bottle from scratch
cons: The complete model is on the smaller side compared to other similar model boats

customer_reviews.title: FAULTY PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: If I followed the plans and drawings the ship would not fit in the bottle. I modified the plans & drawings to make it work. The main mast was too high or the bottle diameter too small. I reduced the length of the mast. When I finish the ship I will take some pictures. Would you like them?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great first ship model
customer_reviews.text: Great first boat. Harder then it looks but made it a great challenge. Stepping stone before you go expensive on a better kit.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to build
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to build a ship in a bottle and there were no other choices but this one on Amazon. This is VERY tiny so make sure you have proper tools to use, for example, a tool that can cut a hole through a toothpick. I would also suggest finding an instant bonding glue because the pieces are so tiny and difficult to hold and wait for glue to dry. I lose patience after working on it for a while, so it is not complete yet.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected, make sure to look at dimensions. But it's a nice kit.
customer_reviews.author: JLang

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my dad who loves building model ships. Presenting a new challenge of it being in a bottle. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: SMALL BUT AS ADVERTISED,
customer_reviews.text: VERY SMALL, AS COMMENTS STATED AND AS STATED IN SPECIFIED DIMENSIONS, NOT COMPLETED WITH 12 YR OLD GRANDSON, AND WE BOTH MAY NEED A LITTLE HELP, YET TO TELL, NOT FINISHED YET. I'M SURE WE WILL, AND IT WILL BE QUITE A KEEP SAKE FOR HIM!! GOOD PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I knew it would be small and I have the tools for small drilling etc but the directions are horrible. Places that were supposed to have markings where I am supposed to drill weren't marked and I was missing parts out of the kit. Would not order again or recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: This didnt come with all the pieces so it just sits in the box unusable.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to build
customer_reviews.text: Bought for husband. He is very excited to build this wooden ship the model itself small
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: My son bought this. He was very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Folkmann

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It’s cheap quality and impossible instructions. Not all pieces were included
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Fun and challenging activity.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble. My son and I are working hard at this project.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque
